briefTitle: Second Plecanatide Study In Irritable Bowel Syndrome With Constipation (IBS-C)
officialTitle: Second Phase 3 Randomized, 12-Week, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study of the Safety and Efficacy of Plecanatide in Patients With Irritable Bowel Syndrome With Constipation (IBS-C)
conditions: Irritable Bowel Syndrome Characterized by Constipation
summary: This study in patients with IBS-C is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel-group clinical trial with 12 weeks of study drug therapy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Overall Responders - ITT Population
